DOC.brief_summary: Cervical cancer second frequent cancer woman French Guiana . Studies show population live remote village interior territory early sexual relation multiple sexual partnership frequent . Hence , main objective study determine prevalence HPV area , predictive factor epidemiology viral infection . Methods - This multicentric cross sectional study aim population woman age 20 65 year , live remote village along Maroni Oyapock river . Women wish participate include informed study team schedule radio address key opinion leader . The search HPV cytologic examination perform woman . 2 sample take woman : one sample send Fort De France hospital cytology , HPV test ; cytologic analyse perform use 2001 Bethesda classification . Another sample send Pasteur Institute Cayenne sequence detection E6 E7 RNA associate carcinogenesis . HPV infection define detection viral DNA use GREINER-BIO-ONE kit . Statistical analysis result use STATA software map use Mapinfo .
DOC.brief_title: Epidemiology Human Papillomavirus Infection Among Women Living Maroni Oyapock Rivers
DOC.criteria: Women age 20 65 living common Maroni river ( Apatou , Grand Santi , Papaichton , Maripasoula Native American territory Upper Maroni ) / Oyapock ( Saint Georges , Camopi , Three Jumps ) Having already sexual intercourse Having give information , consent inclusion study Age < 20 age > 65 year Being pregnant 3 month Have hysterectomy Denial participation
